title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. IV, pt. 515 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. IV, pt. 515 - Introduction

State Regulations
§ 515.1 - Persons subject to the new york state military law
§ 515.2 - The military justice system
§ 515.3 - Non-judicial punishment
§ 515.4 - The role of the commander in the military justice system
§ 515.5 - The commander's legal options
§ 515.6 - Rights warnings given to the accused
§ 515.7 - Preparation, preferral and forwarding of charges
§ 515.8 - Preparation for trial by summary courts-martial
§ 515.9 - Absent without leave (awol) and unauthorized absence (ua)
§ 515.10 - Apprehension of persons

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. L, ch. IV, pt. 515

Statutory authority: Military Law, §130.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
